content.gatha1: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā;
content.gatha2: Manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
content.gathalast: Tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, cakkaṃva vahato padaṃ.
content.gatha1: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā;
content.gatha2: Manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
content.gathalast: Tato naṃ sukhamanveti, chāyāva anapāyinīanupāyinī .
content.gatha1: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajiniajinī maṃ ahāsi me;
content.gathalast: Ye ca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ na sammati.
content.gatha1: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
content.gathalast: Ye ca taṃ nupanayhanti, veraṃ tesūpasammati.
content.gatha1: Na hi verena verāni, sammantīdha kudācanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Averena ca sammanti, esa dhammo sanantano.
content.gatha1: Pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase;
content.gathalast: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
content.gatha1: Subhānupassiṃ viharantaṃ, indriyesu asaṃvutaṃ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ ve pasahati māro, vāto rukkhaṃva dubbalaṃ.
content.gatha1: Asubhānupassiṃ viharantaṃ, indriyesu susaṃvutaṃ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ ve nappasahati māro, vāto selaṃva pabbataṃ.
content.gatha1: Anikkasāvo kāsāvaṃ, yo vatthaṃ paridahissati;
content.gathalast: Apeto damasaccena, na so kāsāvamarahati.
content.gatha1: Yo ca vantakasāvassa, sīlesu susamāhito;
content.gathalast: Upeto damasaccena, sa ve kāsāvamarahati.
content.gatha1: Asāre sāramatino, sāre cāsāradassino;
content.gathalast: Te sāraṃ nādhigacchanti, micchāsaṅkappagocarā.
content.gatha1: Sārañca sārato ñatvā, asārañca asārato;
content.gathalast: Te sāraṃ adhigacchanti, sammāsaṅkappagocarā.
content.gatha1: Yathā agāraṃ ducchannaṃ, vuṭṭhī samativijjhati;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ abhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo samativijjhati.
content.gatha1: Yathā agāraṃ suchannaṃ, vuṭṭhī na samativijjhati;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo na samativijjhati.
content.gatha1: Idha socati pecca socati, pāpakārī ubhayattha socati;
content.gathalast: So socati so vihaññati, disvā kammakiliṭṭhamattano.
content.gatha1: Idha modati pecca modati, katapuñño ubhayattha modati;
content.gathalast: So modati so pamodati, disvā kammavisuddhimattano.
content.gatha1: Idha tappati pecca tappati, pāpakārīpāpakāri ubhayattha tappati;
content.gathalast: ‘‘Pāpaṃ me kata’’nti tappati, bhiyyobhīyo tappati duggatiṃ gato.
content.gatha1: Idha nandati pecca nandati, katapuñño ubhayattha nandati;
content.gathalast: ‘‘Puññaṃ me kata’’nti nandati, bhiyyo nandati suggatiṃ gato.
content.gatha1: Bahumpi ce saṃhita sahitaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.) bhāsamāno, na takkaro hoti naro pamatto;
content.gathalast: Gopova gāvo gaṇayaṃ paresaṃ, na bhāgavā sāmaññassa hoti.
content.gatha1: Appampi ce saṃhita bhāsamāno, dhammassa hotihotīhotī anudhammacārī;
content.gatha2: Rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohaṃ, sammappajāno suvimuttacitto;
content.gathalast: Anupādiyāno idha vā huraṃ vā, sa bhāgavā sāmaññassa hoti.
